definitions.qi3 lai5: to stand up; to get up; also pr. [qi3 lai2];
definitions.qi5 lai5: (after a verb) indicating the beginning and continuation of an action or a state; indicating an upward movement (e.g. after 站[zhan4]); bringing things together (e.g. after 收拾[shou1 shi5]); (after a perception verb, e.g. 看[kan4]) expressing preliminary judgment; also pr. [qi3 lai5];
